full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 (30) My occupation is HOUSEWIFE List the names, addresses, and occupations (or types of business) of your employers during the last 5 years? (If none, write "None.") List present employment FIRST. FROM To- EMPLOYER'S NAME ADDRESS OCCUPATION OR TYPE OF BUSINESS (a) 19 PRESENT TIME NONE (b) 19 19 (c) 19 19 (d) 19 19 (31) Complete this block if you are or have been married. I am MARRIED The first name of my husband or wife is (was) KE (Single, married, divorced, widowed) We were married on OCT. 1946 at THAIBINH, VIETNAM He or she was born at THAI BiNH VIETNAM on 1915 He or she entered the United States at (place) FT.CHAFFEE ARKANSAS on (date) 05/18/75 for permanent residence and now resides with me apart from me at ADDRESS UNKNOWN in USA (Show full address if not living with you.) He or she was naturalized on at ; Certificate No or became a citizen by N/A His or her alien Registration No. is (32) How many times have you been married? How many times has your husband or wife been married? 01 If either of you has been married more than once, fill in the following information for each previous marriage. (Check One) DATE MARRIED DATE MARRIAGE ENDED NAME OF PERSON TO WHOM MARRIED SEX PERSON MARRIED WAS How MARRIAGE CITIZEN ALIEN ENDED (a) (b) N/A (c) (d) (33) I have 07 children: (Complete columns (a) to (h) as to each child. If child lives with you, state "with me" in column (h), other- (Number) wise give city and State of child's residence.) (b) Sex (c) Place Born (d) Date (e) Date (f) Port of Entry (g) Alien (a) Given Names (Country) Born of Entry Registration No. (h) Now Living at- FOIA (b)(6) (34) READ INSTRUCTION NO. 6 BEFORE ANSWERING QUESTION (36) I DONOT want certificates of citizenship for those of my children who are in the U.S. and are under age 18 years that are named below. (Do) (Do Not) (Enclose $15 for each child for whom you want certificates, otherwise, send no money with this application.) N/A Write names of children under age 18 years and who are in the U.S. for whom you want certificates) If present spouse is not the parent of the children named above, give parent's name, date and place of naturalization, and number of marriages N/A
